sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The whatrow function is used to determine the cursor position's row.
sections.mdown_content: The **whatrow** function is used to determine the cursor position's row.

sections.title: Example
code:
locate  ( 5, 10 )
        put "12345"..
        put "The current row is", whatrow
        put "The current column is", whatcol
sections.raw_content: This program outputs The current row is 5, the current column is 15.
sections.mdown_content: This program outputs *The current row is 5*,* the current column is 15*.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: The screen should be in a "screen" or "graphics" mode. whatrow functions properly even if the cursor is invisible.
sections.mdown_content: The screen should be in a "*screen*" or* *"*graphics*" mode. **whatrow** functions properly even if the cursor is invisible.

sections.title: See also
sections.raw_content:
the whatcol function, which is used to set the determine the cursor column. See also the locate, maxrow and maxcol procedure.

See also predefined unit Text.
sections.mdown_content:
the **[whatcol.html](whatcol)** function, which is used to [set.html](set) the determine the cursor column. See also the **[locate.html](locate)**, **[maxrow.html](maxrow)** and **[maxcol.html](maxcol)** [procedure.html](procedure).
See also predefined unit **[textmodule.html](Text)**.
